alert.note: Alert for Kent; Queen Anne's (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 7:16PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Queen Anne`s and Kent Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 716 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Aberdeen Proving Ground to near Bowleys Quarters. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chestertown, Rock Hall, Betterton, Newtown, Morgnec, Old Town, Massey, Crumpton, Kennedyville, Langford, Galena and Kingstown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
